messages.msgSnippet: ... Denise , I didn t criticize your grammar, but I feel guilty because I brought up the Grammar issue.  I wasn t sure how a child would learn grammar on their
messages.messageBody:
--- dmm5692@... wrote:
> this list is too immature for me.......I DO
> understand the mirror theory~ I
> live by it! i know that i do not belong here~ i like
> who i am and i do not
> need people criticizing how i use a
> word..manicured......guess!>???surmise??
> assume even i f you want? OR ASK NICELY!!!!!!
> sarcasm is not my cup of tea.
> bye all ~Denise
>
Denise ,

I didn't criticize your grammar, but I feel guilty
because I brought up the Grammar issue. I wasn't sure
how a child would learn grammar on their own.
I sent a post asking and had about 3 mistakes in the
sentence. LOL I was corrected to , but I thought it
was all in good humor. I think people forget to type
LOL or other little notation they use to show it is in
good humor. When I type I do not alway have my
sentence grammatically correct. Geez I have fragments
runons and what else you can get wrong. When I am in
groups or chats I type the sometimes the way I talk.
Sometimes I think faster than my fingers can keep up
with. Don't leave.

Lilly
PS your not old and crochety!
